sectionHeading: Weekend Events / Traffic Impacts for June 4 - 5

event: "Run for the Nun" at Elizabeth Ann Seton Catholic Church starting at 8 a.m..  See below for street closures.
"Swinging Under the Stars" in downtown Lexington from 7 p.m. to 11 p.m.  See below for street closures.

day: Street Closures Scheduled for "Swinging Under the Stars":
event: The following streets will be closed from 3 p.m. to 11 p.m. (approximate) on Saturday June 4:

day: Street Closures Scheduled for "Swinging Under the Stars":
event: W Main St traffic will be diverted to Broadway.

day: Street Closures Scheduled for "Swinging Under the Stars":
event: Inbound W Main St and W Vine St will remain open.

day: Street Closures Scheduled for "Run for the Nun":
